name: ZIGGY
description: Ziggy is an uber theatrical magician who excels at using electricity in his act. He's a bit full of himself, but hey, he can literally control lightning. Just remember... they're not tricks, they're illusions.
descriptionHtml: Ziggy is an uber theatrical magician who excels at using electricity in his act. He's a bit full of himself, but hey, he can literally control lightning. Just remember... they're not tricks, they're illusions.
